<div id="whats_new" class="registered_link"></div>

The following features are added to create EDB .NET Connector `4.1.6.1`:

-   Merged with the upstream Npgsql driver version 4.1.6. For more information about the merge updates, visit <https://www.nuget.org/packages/Npgsql/4.1.6>.
-   Support for .NET Framework 4.7.2 and .NET Framework 4.8.
